description: Stock Android keyboard. Safe to remove if replaced by another keyboard.  WARNING: if your device is encrypted with a password, the default keyboard is needed.
label: Android Keyboard (AOSP)

description: System component powered by Chrome that allows Android apps to display web content. Remove it if you don't need in-app web content or use Jelly
label: Android System WebView

label: ANT HAL Service

description: Audio equalizer.

name: AudioFX
